title: Tell me about a problem you experienced at a hotel.

korean: 작년에 호텔에서 좀 불편한 경험이 있었어.
체크인했는데 방 에어컨이 고장 나 있었어.
여름이라 너무 더워서 참을 수가 없었어.
직원이 기사를 보낸다고 했는데, 한 시간이나 기다렸어.
기사가 와서 확인했는데, 바로 고칠 수 없다고 하더라고.
다행히 빈 방이 있어서 옮길 수 있었어.
짐 싸서 옮기는 게 번거로웠지만 어쩔 수 없었어.
새 방은 괜찮았는데, 처음부터 이런 문제가 없었으면 좋았을 텐데.
호텔 측에서 사과하면서 조식 무료로 제공해 줬어.
룸 업그레이드 쿠폰도 줘서 나중에 다시 왔을 때 사용했어.
그때는 문제없이 잘 지냈는데, 처음 경험은 별로였어.
그래도 호텔에서 성의 있게 대응해서 그나마 다행이었어.
english: Last year, I had a kind of uncomfortable experience at a hotel.
After checking in, the room's air conditioner was broken.
It was summer, so it was too hot and I honestly couldn't stand it.
So I called the front desk and explained the situation.
The staff said they would send a technician, but I literally waited a whole hour.
The technician came and checked, but said it couldn't be fixed right away.
So eventually I requested to move to another room, you know.
Fortunately there was an empty room, so I could move.
Packing and moving was pretty bothersome, but there was no choice.
The new room was okay, but it would have been nice if there hadn't been this problem from the start.
In the end, the hotel apologized and provided breakfast for free.
They also gave me a room upgrade coupon, which I used when I came back later.
That time I stayed well without problems, but the first experience was not great.
Still, I was at least fortunate that the hotel responded sincerely.
